title: Judges 9
content: Gideon’s son Abimelech is made king—He slays his seventy brothers—Jotham tells a fable of trees choosing a king—The Shechemites conspire against Abimelech—He is slain at Thebez.

Then he called hastily unto the young man his armourbearer, and said unto him, Draw thy sword, and slay me, that men say not of me, A woman slew him. And his young man thrust him through, and he died.
And when the men of Israel saw that Abimelech was dead, they departed every man unto his place.
¶Thus God rendered the wickedness of Abimelech, which he did unto his father, in slaying his seventy brethren:
of the men of Shechem did God render upon their heads: and upon them came the curse of Jotham the son of Jerubbaal.
